page.title: 01THE QUESTIONNAIRE
page.content: {The pupils of class one of Stockland School devised a questionnaire to collect information to help them with the Domesday Project. It was devised by suggesting questions, and then they were discussed for their suitability; for example, how long have you lived in your present home ? The first questionnaire was then piloted on our parents. When they were returned a few changes were made. We delivered the new questionnaire personally within the D_Block, with the help of parents' cars. They were collected in the same way a few days later. After collection we worked with the raw data to collate the relevant statistics which were then expressed in charts and graphs. Charlotte Blackler,11.
